entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
